Are you a geography buff or just interested in learning more about the world's flags? Then you'll love our Flag Guessing Game! Test your knowledge of countries and their flags with this fun and addictive game.

With our Flag Guessing Game, you'll be presented with a random country flag and four possible country names to choose from. Can you guess the correct country? With over 200 countries in the world, it's not as easy as it sounds!

Now you can even choose which continent you want to explore in the newest version!

Not only is this game educational, but it's also a great way to pass the time. Play it on your lunch break, during your commute, or whenever you have a spare moment. With its simple and intuitive design, it's perfect for all ages and skill levels.

So why wait? Download the Flag Guessing Game chrome extension today and start expanding your knowledge of world flags!
